relation: Drains the target’s Magicka by 1 points per seconds for 10 seconds.
Drains the target’s Magicka by 1 points per seconds for 15 seconds.
Drains the target’s Magicka by 2 points per seconds for 15 seconds.
Drains the target’s Magicka by 2 points per seconds for 20 seconds.
Drains the target’s Magicka by 3 points per seconds for 20 seconds.
textBeforeTable: Cure ConditionEdit The tables below are sorted by the effect of the potions. Most effect titles match those found in the Alchemy menu for the sake of simplicity, but some do not. Potions Edit [show] Contents For potions created through the use of the Alchemy skill, see this page. Potions can be purchased, found, or even created. This page deals strictly with potions and poisons found in the game environment and the inventories of NPCs, like vendors and so forth. All potions and poisons weigh () 0.5 units. Poisons, on the other hand, are applied to weapons and detrimentally affect the targeted NPC. Potions help by restoring health/magicka/stamina, fortifying an ability or the effect of an ability, or otherwise benefiting the Dragonborn. There are two different subdivisions of potions. Potions are consumable items found throughout the province of Skyrim and the rest of Tamriel. Many potions are leveled to accommodate the needs of the ever-growing Dragonborn. For created potions, see Created Potions (Skyrim).
textAfterTable: Philter of Alteration 00039899 Alteration spells last 75% longer for 60 seconds. 165 Elixir of Alteration 0003989A Alteration spells last 100% longer for 60 seconds. 227 Fortify BarterEdit Name/ID Effect Potion of Haggling 0003EB35 You haggle for 10% better prices for 30 seconds. 84
